meanings.definition: To make into or treat as a monument.
meanings.sent1: The artist monumentalizes the fallen soldiers in his sculpture.
meanings.sent2: The city monumentalizes its history through statues and plaques.
meanings.sent3: The children playfully monumentalize their sandcastle with seashells.
meanings.sent4: Her song monumentalizes the beauty of nature in its lyrics.
meanings.sent5: The sunset monumentalizes the end of a perfect day.

meanings.definition: To commemorate or honor with a monument.
meanings.sent1: The community monumentalizes the founder with a statue in the park.
meanings.sent2: They monumentalize their ancestors by preserving their stories.
meanings.sent3: The students jokingly monumentalize their favorite teacher with a cardboard cutout.
meanings.sent4: His sacrifice monumentalizes the bravery of all firefighters.
meanings.sent5: The grand ceremony monumentalizes the achievements of the team.
